name: raycast-weekly-newsletter
title: Raycast Weekly Newsletter
description: Browse and interact with Raycast Weekly Newsletter
author: alexi.build

commands.name: browse-posts
commands.title: Browse Posts
commands.description: List and read Raycast Weekly posts

commands.name: submit-content
commands.title: Submit Content
commands.description: Submit content ideas to Raycast Weekly

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
